ud8.5:1.2: At one time the Buddha was wandering in the land of the Mallas together with a large Saṅgha when he arrived at Pāvā.
ud8.5:1.3: There he stayed in Cunda the smith’s mango grove.
ud8.5:2.1: Cunda heard that the Buddha had arrived and was staying in his mango grove.
ud8.5:2.3: Then he went to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side.
ud8.5:2.4: The Buddha educated, encouraged, fired up, and inspired him with a Dhamma talk.
